entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Englee 4:30 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

Wind Chill: -17
Wind: NW 32 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16 except temperature steady near minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 16 except temperature steady near minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 11 except low minus 16 inland.
